item.e: Haven't seen you for a long time.
Excuse me, is manager Wang here?
Let me introduce you to each other。
My name is Wang Yi Le.
Thank you. Sorry for the trouble.
This is my girl friend Xiao Yu.
I wish you a long and healthy life.
How many people are there in your family?
There are three people in my family.
Do you have an email address?
Won't you stay a little longer?
We've got something else to do.
Please don't bother to see us out.
Give me a call when you are free.
Could you do me a favor?
Could you take a picture for us, please?
Try to do something about it.
Hello, can I speak to Xiao Zhang?
I'll wait for you at the subway station.

item.c: 我们一起吃晚饭好不好？
item.e: How about having dinner with me?
Do you want me to pick you up?
I don't have any free time this weekend.
Sorry for having kept you waiting.
You can call his cell phone.
Could you please tell Manager Liu?
Could you please ask him to call me back?
I will be sure to tell him.
What do you think of him?
I didn't get any sleep last night.
My girl friend broke up with me.
I really hadn't thought of that.
It's not good for your health.
How are you doing at the university?
Which university did you graduate from?
What job have you had before?
I used to be a reporter.
I want to do something different.
What do you want to do in the future?
I want to be a translator.

item.c: 你在这里工作多长时间了?
item.e: How long have you been working here?
What do you up to these days?
I'm quite interested in tradional chinese painting.
There are so many things I want to learn.
What do you usually do on weekends?
I like reading and listening to the music
What would you like to eat?

item.c: 我要这个, 还有那个.

item.e: I'd like a cup of coffee.

item.c: 请你再给我几张餐巾纸.
item.e: Could you give me a few more napkins, please?
That's 38 Yuan and 5 Jiao in total.
The rest room is on the second floor.
Excuse me, is this seat taken?
Come here and take a seat.
I want to have some vegetables.
Is there anything you don't eat?
Go easy on the oil, please.
We'd like to order one more dish.
Could you pack up the leftovers for us?

item.c: 请你们等一会儿, 行吗?
item.e: Would you please wait for a while?
How long do we need to wait?
These are local snacks from Chengdu.
Let's go and buy some drinks.
How do you make this dish?
I really cann't drink any more.
Help yourself to some food. (Literal translation: You first, please.)

item.c: 这里的广东菜比较地道..
item.e: The Cantonese food here is authentic.
It is really a big dinner.

item.c: 为我们的合作成功干杯.
item.e: Let's toast to our surccessful cooperation.
Do I need to leave my bag here?

item.c: 请问洗发水在什么地方?
item.e: Excuse me, where is the shampoo?
Exercuse me, can I get by?
Maybe something is wrong with it.
Do you have the receipt with you?
Can I exchange one for you?
Here is one hundred yuan note.
I'll go and change some money.

item.c: 这是一张五毛的, 不是五块的
item.e: This is five jiao, not five yuan.
I can fix it in a minute.
How do I make a payment?
You can pay it via the post office.
Or you can just pay on deliverly.
Paying on deliverly sounds most convenient.
Can I return or change it if there is any problem.
I want to order a piza.

item.c: 请送到北京大学西门吧.
item.e: Could you please deliver it to the west gate of Peiking University?
I will call you when I arrive.
What kind of cloth do you want to make?
I'd like to have a Qipao made.
This is the style I'd like.
You'll certerly look beautiful in a Qipao.
When can I come for a fitting?
What material is it made of?

item.c: 蓝色的好还是黄色的好?
item.e: Which do you think is better? The blue one or the yellow one.
The blue one is more suitable for you.
What a sham! It's a little tight.
Is it possible to get a discount?
We're looking for a small refrigerator.
This type doesn't make much noise.
Which one is the best quality?
All of them are good quality.
What is the function of this one?
You can play DVDs, CDs and VCDs with it.
How long is the warrenty period?

item.c: 请告诉我您的地址和电话.
item.e: Could you please tell me your address and telephon number?
I don't have enough money right now.
Can I use my credit card?

item.c: 你能不能个我推荐一下?
item.e: Could you please recommand one for me?
Which press publish is this book?
Exercuse me? How can I get to the subway station?
Turn left at the crossing ahead.
How far is it from here?
It's only about five minute walk.
I want to go and see her.
Which bus should I take to get there?
You should catch the bus on the oppsite side of the rode.
Excurse me, does this bus go to the Dongfang Housing?
Please let me know when we get there.
This bus doesn't go to the zoo.
Please change to bus 181 at the next stop.
Could you go a little faster?
I have a plane to catch.
Is there another route we can take?
We can try the express way to the airport.
Do you have tickets on the 11th to Shanghai?
Tickets on the 11th are sold out.
Take care. Have a safe trip.
Give us a call when you get there.
The train is about to leave.
Could you tell me where the dinning car is?

item.c: 我想定去西安的往返票.
item.e: I'd like to book a round trip to Xi'an.
Do you have discount tickets available?
Do you have any lungage to check in?
Your luggage has exceeded the weight limit.

item.c: 可以给我一个靠窗的座位吗?
item.e: Can I have a window seat?
Getting Around in One's Own Car
It has been raining for the last couple of days.
The weather has been terrible recently.
Hopefully we'll have good weather this weekend.
The weather forcast says tomorrow will be a fine day.
It might rain in the evening.
Do you have umbrella with you?
Have you got any plans for the weekend?

item.c: 我们想开车去长城玩玩。
item.e: We're planing a drive to the Great Wall.
Is there anything I can do for you?
What time shall we set out?

item.c: 想起六早上六点在大门口见面。
item.e: Let's meet at the main gate at 6am on Saturday morning.
The scene here is so beautiful.
It seems we're running low on gas.
Hurry, let's look at the map.

item.c: 下一个服务区还有多远？
item.e: How far away is the next service center?

item.c: 找不到加油站就麻烦了。
item.e: We'll be in trouble if we cann't find a gas station.
Do you have a tour to Yunnan?

item.c: 不喜欢时间安排得太紧。
item.e: We don't want a tight schedule.
We just want to relax there.

item.c: 我先回去跟太太商量一下。
item.e: I go back and discuss it with my wife first.
I'd like to send this parcel.
Can I buy a cardboard box here?

item.c: 都是一些送朋友的小礼物.
item.e: Just some small gifts for a friend
How much is it by air?
How long does it take for the parcel to arrive?
Is there any other way to do it?

item.c: 这些长城的明信片很不错.
item.e: These postcards of the Great Wall are vey good.

item.c: 我们想看看这些明信片.
item.e: 我们想看看这些明信片.
I take two sets of this, please.
I'd like to send few postcards.
I'd like to book a room.
Could you tell me the room rates first?
Is there air conditioner in the room?

item.c: 十二号上午到, 十五号早上离开.
item.e: I'm checking in on the morning of the 12th, and checking out on the morning of the 15th.

item.c: 请您把证件给我看一下.
item.e: Could I have a look at your ID card?
The elevator is on the right.
What can I do for you?
Why isn't there any hot water?
Can I change to another room?

item.c: 我们的房间已经住满了.

item.e: May I have your room number, please?
You have made two long distance calls.
Sir, do you need a haircut?
I'd like to cut it a bit shorter.
Exactly the same style as before?
I want to have a massage.
My apartment is too far away from my office.
There are many rental ads. in the newspapers.
I don't have time to read them.

item.c: 这家中介公司挺专业的.
item.e: This rental agency is very professional.
I want to find someone to share the rent.
How about trying to find one online?
I can give you a hand moving.
I'd like to rent a apartment.
Which location do you have in mind?
What kind of apartment do you have in mind?
I don't want an old apartment.
I have to contact the landlord first.
Just go ahead and have a look.
What do you think of the arartment?
This apartment is a little bit small.
The two bed rooms are bigger than the living room.
You have easy access to many places.
I don't think it is suitable for me.
Could you look for some other apartments for me?
There is a park opposite the apartment.

item.c: 水电费和煤气费怎么交?
item.e: How do I pay the water, electricity and gas.
It is one thousand nine hundred yuan per month.
When shall we sign the contract?
This is the contract. Have a look at it, please.
Please contact me if you have any questions.
Do you have my cell phone number?
I'm usually at home in the evening,.
Here is the rent for three months.
I'd like to book a van.
Which day do you need the van?
Do you have lots of stuff?
How many people can you send?
Put your valuables in a safe place, please.

item.c: 请您先拿号, 再去那边等候.
item.e: Would you take a number and wait over there please

item.c: 请您填一下这张存款单.
item.e: Could you fill out this deposit slip, please?
Do you have your ID card with you?
How many digits does the pin number have?
Please sign at the bottom right.
What's the matter with this ATM machine.
Just a minute and it will be ok.
Please enter your pin number again.
What can I do for you?
Can I exchange some money here?
Do you want cash or check?
How much would like to exchange?

item.c: 一百美元换八百零三元人民币。
item.e: You can exchange 100 US dallors for 803 yuan.
The US dollar has dropped again.

item.c: 要是上个星期换就好了
item.e: I should have made the exchange last week.
Actually it doesn't make much difference.
Almost time to get off work.
I haven't pay my phone bill.
Banks are open on weekends, aren't they?
I‘ll go and pay the fee tomorrow morning。
Can I pay my phone bill here？
I'd like to pay my phone bill.
Can i transfer some money here?
Do you have the receipient's account number?
It only take 10 minutes for the money to arrive.
How much is the handling fee?
A maximum of 50 yuan for one transfer.
I'd like to withdraw 5000 yuan from this card.

item.c: 对不起，我们这里不能用这种卡
item.e: Sorry, we don't take this kind of card.
It's a good think you've come with me.
I can't find my credit card
Fortunaty, I didn't lose my ID card.
Approximately how much money do you have in your account?
Please come in and pick it up in a week.
Will you accompany me to the hospital?
I‘d like to see a specialist, please.
Let me take your temperature first.
I have a fever and a headache.
Do you have any other symptoms?
You may have caught a cold.
I'll give you some tablets for the cold.
How ofter should I take it?
Three time a day, one tablet each time.
How many days do I need to take it?
Drink plenty of water and have a good rest.
My throat is dry and itchy.
My tooth have been hurting again recently.
I have heard of this medicine.
Does it have any side effects?
Could you send an abbulance right now?
He has had a car crash.
You'd better not move the patient.
He'd better stay in the ward for observation for a few days.
I'd like to fill this prescription
This bottle is for external use.
Take care not to mix them up.
Visiting a Friend in the Hospital
It's really boring to stay in the hospital.

item.c: 等你出院了咱们去打网球。
item.e: After you leave the hospital, we can go and play tennis.
Can she leave the hospital this week?
Her illness is already under control.
I've been having troble sleeping recently.
I feel a bit dizzy sometimes.
You should eat more vegitables and fruits.
Do you have any other advice?
You should exercise more when you are free.
When should I drop off and pick up my child every day?
You'd better drop him off before 8am.
How many teachers in each class?
Can I have a look around?
She slept at noon for one hour.
We'll have three days off for new years holiday.
This greeting card is for you.

item.c: 大家好, 我们开始上课。
他病了，让我跟您说一下。
item.e: He asked me to let you know that he is ill.

item.c: 请打开书，翻到第十六页。
item.e: Open your book please and turn to page 16.
How do you say happy in Chinese?
How do you pronounce this character?
Could you say it a bit more slowly?
I'd like borrow to this book.
How long can I keep a book?
Student can keep a book for a month.
Can I renew a book when it's due?
What if I forget to return the due book?
Do you have wireless access to the Internet here?
I'm in the computer science department.
Our professors are all at a high level of proficiency.
They are rather strict with us.
Is there a make up exam?
We can talk more next time.
Where can I find Internet bar?
I want to check my mail.
Where do you go online normally?

item.c: 我的笔记本电脑突然坏了。
下学期他想来这儿学习
item.e: She wants to study here next semester.

item.c: 一个学期的学费是多少？
item.e: What are the tution fees for one semester?
I can speak only a little Chinese.
Students are supposed to register on Sep 1st.

item.c: 你想去外边坐一会儿吗？
item.e: How about sit outside for a little while？
Do you mind if I open the window?
What would you like to drink？
What fruit juice do you have?
It's very popular with the girls.
Do you want to have a try?
How about going dancing with me？
I really don't want to go.

item.c: 今天是周末。放松一下吧。
item.e: Anyway, it's the weekend. Let's relax.
The atmosphere is very nice here.

item.c: 最早的一场是下午四点。
item.e: The earliest show is at 4 in the afternoon.
There is a snack bar at the entrance.

item.c: 你觉得这部片子怎么样？
item.e: What do you think of this movie?
Not as good as I had thought.
Excuse me, where is booth No. 3?
I just select an English song.
This song has been very popular recently.

item.c: 我喜欢听歌，但是不喜欢唱歌。
item.e: I like listening, but not singing.

item.c: 你平时喜欢听什么音乐？
有时听民歌，有时听流行歌曲。
item.e: Sometimes I listen to Chinese folk music and sometimes pop music.
I like rock and roll very much.
She likes watching acrobatic shows most.
Is that theater far from here?
Can we get there in half an hour?
Let's get going right after the meal.
Excuse me, which row is it?
As long as you like it.
Listening to a CD at home is even better.

item.c: 现场的效果完全不一样。
item.e: Seeling it live will be totally different.
Could I take a picture with you?
How about watching Peking Opera with me, my treat.
I never watched Peking opera before.
I‘m afraid I won't be able to understand what they're saying .
I want to go back and get changed.
Could you tell me where our seats are?

item.c: 今天的演员都非常有名。
item.e: The performancers today are all very famous.
Let's turn off our cell phones.
Does you museum have a website?
I want to take a shower.
The air is so fresh in the morning.
How long have you been practicing?

item.c: 我个子不高，可是我喜欢打篮球。
item.e: I'm not tall, but I'd like to play basketball.
I don't really have time to exercise.
I put some weight back on against this month.
Which method do you think works best?
It varies from person to person.
The most important thing is to keep at it.
What would you like to play?
It has been a long time since I played tennis.
The beginner class is quite easy.
Shall we ask XiaoYang to come with us?
I'd like to book a tennis court for tomorrow.
I think he is just so so.
You can play better than him.
I want to watch the world cup.
Who do you want to win?

item.c: 我的梦想是参加奥运会。
item.e: My dream is to take part in the Olympic Game.
Why didn't I think of that?
No wonder you're so good at swimming.
I want to learn to swim.
Can I have a new pair?
I'm afrarid I can't go any further.

item.c: 你只要有信心就可以了。

item.e: There are many advantage of running.
How long do you usually run?
